location_services_disabled: Location services are disabled. Please enable location services to use KıbTaxi.
location_permissions_permanently_denied: Location permissions are permanently denied on this app. Please open your location settings & allow location access permissions to KıbTaxi.
want_to_remove_all: Are you sure that you want to remove all your saved taxis?
nothing_to_show: There is nothing to show here.
outside_country: Our application has been developed for use in the Turkish Republic of Northern Cyprus only.
phone_denied: The phone call permission is required to make this call.
phone_permanently_denied: The permission is permanently denied, please enable it in the app settings.
rating_score_google_maps: The rating score on Google Maps
near_taxis_error: We couldn't find any taxis near you. Try to change your location to one of our popular locations.
